name: In Search Of Water
description:
In Search Of Water

A small, atmospheric platformer with procedurally animated creatures. 

Avoid hungry creatures and discover the source of frequent tremors disturbing the local eco-system.

How To Play

Keyboard and Mouse:

  1. Move Left - A or Left Arrow Key
  2. Move Right - D or Right Arrow Key
  3. Jump - C or Space

Controller (Xbox):

  1. Move Left - Left stick left
  2. Move Right - Left stick right
  3. Jump - A

Twitter: @DeveloperTom1

Website/Blog: https://www.tomstephensondeveloper.co.uk/

This game was created for the Ludum Dare 49 event in 72 hours.

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/49/in-search-of-water
